definition: "to eat" or "food" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 184)
a kind of rice-flour noodles from Yunnan province

sentences.english: You're bait won't float that great when using fluorocarbon as your leader.
sentences.chinese: 用氟碳線的時候你的餌不會浮的那麼好。

sentences.english: The fish will soon be caught that nibbles at every bait.
sentences.chinese: 見餌就咬的魚，很快就會上鉤。

sentences.english: I use baits with rattles for this also.
Most drift live bait, which is a much easier way to catch fish.
sentences.chinese: 他們很多都用活餌，這樣上魚要容易得多。

sentences.english: Thy baited hooks shall tangle me no more.
sentences.chinese: 你上餌的鉤子不再能把我纏絞。

sentences.english: The traitor in strait straight forwardly told me the traits of the bait.
sentences.chinese: 海峽裏的賣國賊直接主動地告訴了我餌的特性。

sentences.english: I think we need to buy some baits and borrow some fish poles first.
sentences.chinese: 我想我們需要先買一些餌，然後借一些釣竿。

sentences.english: Bait the hook. See if he bites.
Objective To observe the efficacy of gel bait against cockroches in dormitory.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察曄康殺蟑膠餌對職工宿舍蟑螂的殺滅效果。

sentences.english: "Alice," Carlisle asked, "will they take the bait?"
sentences.chinese: “愛麗絲，”卡萊爾問道，“他們會咬餌嗎？”

sentences.english: The beauty of drop shotting is that it presents your bait naturally.
sentences.chinese: 倒釣的美妙之處在於，它能很自然的呈現你的餌。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the efficacy of 2% acetaniprid gel bait against Blattella germanica.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察2%啶蟲脒殺蟑膠餌對德國小蠊的殺滅效果。

sentences.english: They are streamed together, which is named "Er".
sentences.chinese: 把它們混在一起則稱爲“餌”。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Premise cockroach gel bait on killing Blattella germanica.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察拜滅士殺蟑膠餌現場殺滅德國小蠊的效果。

sentences.english: When something took one of his remaining baits, he cut the line with his sheath knife.
sentences.chinese: 當他把剩下的東西餌之一，他與他的削減鞘刀線。

sentences.english: However, don't overcompensate and hurt the action of the lure.
sentences.chinese: 當然，不能因此而影響到擬餌的泳姿。

definition: to fish with a hook and bait
to hook/to sew/to crochet/hook/check mark or tick/window catch
variant of 御[yu4]/to drive/to manage/to control
to slander/to defame/to misrepresent/to speak maliciously
